question: Which country's traditional local craft is "Limoges Porcelain"?
explanation: Limoges Porcelain is one of the traditional local crafts of France. Limoges Porcelain is hard-paste porcelain produced by factories in and around the city of Limoges, France beginning in the late 18th century. By 1830, Limoges city had replaced Paris as the main center for private porcelain factories. Limoges maintains the position it established in the 19th century as the premier manufacturing city of porcelain in France.
